title: Players to help me get to gold this season currently Bronze 4
body: I know its a long shot but i want gold this season

replies.body: Forget about getting to gold, and focus on getting better at the game.
well thats wat i want exactly

No it's not clearly.

They are drastically different ways to go about it.

This topic shows your only focusing on getting to gold.
Pick an op meta champ if you're just going for this season

Easy way to get gold
Method 1
Elo boost 
Method 2
Get gud scrub
Method 3
There is no method 3

step 1. play league
step 2. download replays
step 3. realise you're garbage and change.

Everyone KNOWS what the right thing to do is, the trick is doing it in game. Watching replays can really help pinpoint your mishaps and misplays and help you learn from them.
Lucky Riot has added them to the client so they are quick and easy to access.

Also work on your CS'ing. Its pretty bad.

http://oce.op.gg/summoner/userName=Bunjii
